data.persona: I am a strong man. I work in the fields and pastures all day. I take of my master's sheep. One day I hope to have my own sheep.
data.description:
You are in the desert tent.
The tent is rather small, only just big enough for one man. Its dark green but covered with sand and dirt. The man huddles alone in the desert with few resources. The desert is barren except for the lone man.
There's an a sleeping bag and a tent here.
The vulture is here.

You are carrying a sickle, an basket, a hoe for digging, and a Rake, and wearing a shoe.

data.short_motivation: I have to hit this vulture with my sickle to kill it
data.mid_motivation: I want to stop it from stealing my food when I'm not home
data.long_motivation: I'm going to put it's head outside my door to deter other vultures from coming back and stealing my things again.
